events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on March 30th, requesting to file an official claim.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the incident details and keywords provided.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the auto accident claim and coordinate further necessary actions.
The customer was notified that their claim has been officially acknowledged and is now under review by our team.
We requested copies of the police report, vehicle damage photos, and insurance documents to proceed with claim investigation.
The customer submitted the requested documents including police report and photographs showing the vehicle collision damage.
Our claims investigation team has begun assessing the submitted evidence to determine the circumstances and liability.
The investigation of the auto accident claim is complete, confirming the reported details and verifying the extent of damage.
A settlement offer has been prepared and proposed to the customer for repair costs and associated expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested prompt processing of the payment.
The claim has been formally approved after customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms and conditions.
Payment for the approved claim was issued today to the customerâ€™s designated bank account to cover vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful resolution and payment processing.
